content: you ve asked and i ve listened i already have all the crochet a-z toys with me patterns listed as bundle deals and available on my blog but i will be slowly adding each individual pattern to my ravelry to be able to offer the e-book this single pattern is to make the crochet apple it is a 3-page pdf i believe this pattern is suitable to beginners as i have everything written out i use us crochet terms this pattern requires a size g/4mm and h/5mm hook 4-ply worsted weight type yarn and some stuffing i am here all to help and support you in any way i can after you download my pattern i would love to see your apples made from this pattern so please tag me on ig @theburgundybasket
